title: Zed's shadows should mimic a shadowy mastery emote

replies.body: the best BM in the game?
but the unseen BM is the deadliest.
He has the best laugh spam, lets give him the best mastery spam as well
Lux's laugh spam takes the crown
Ahri has the best sound when she dies. X)
Oh man I remember back the old days when I played old Taric I bonded my mouse wheel for the joke instead of ctrl1 and spammed "gems are truly truly outrageous" all game

> [{quoted}](name=UnknownToPublic,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JAHIZrFh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-05T07:28:17.884+0000)
>
> Lux's laugh spam takes the crown

Back in the day it was global Amumu robot laugh.

> [{quoted}](name=Hunstoppable,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JAHIZrFh,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-09-05T23:08:12.251+0000)
>
> Back in the day it was global Amumu robot laugh.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YyyRercF9c4
Singed is still the best, sorry.

I have to disagree with this suggestion. Had you been more in depth I would have been inclined to agree, but as it stands this thread is a living shadow of what it could have been. Spamming the mastery emote only further shows a player's contempt for the weak.
As long as Gangplank gets oranges http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9c/Remove_Scurvy.png/revision/latest?cb=20150707190028&format=webp on his mastery emote.
Have 3 shadows surround one guy (adc) then Mastery Emote when your ult is about to proc. Or when your in lane and escape someone, put your shadow in lane then proc your emote.
